stimulusHtml: The painting most strongly suggests a link between nationalism and which of the following?

features.html:
Questions 17 and 18 refer to the painting below.

Isidore Pils, French painter, Rouget de Lisle Singing “La Marseillaise,” 1849

Snark / Art Resource, NY

The painting portrays Claude-Joseph Rouget de Lisle, a composer, offering the ﬁrst performance, in 1792, of his patriotic song “La Marseillaise,” which became the French national anthem.
